name: deeg
description: The night is darkest just before the dawn. And I promise you, the dawn is coming.

scripts.test: mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --require coffee-coverage/register-istanbul ./test/ && istanbul report text-summary lcov
scripts.codecov: mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --require coffee-coverage/register-istanbul ./test/ && istanbul report && codecov

author: SirSeim <sirseim@gmail.com>
